numerics.internal.strings



pure nothrow @nogc @safe Header detect(S)(const Header expected, auto ref const S s, ref size_t index) if (isSomeString!S);
detects a string header

pure nothrow @nogc @safe Header detect(R)(const Header expected, ref R range) if (isInputRange!R && isSomeChar!(ElementType!R) && !isSomeString!R);
detects a string header
